wordpressWpPostsEn.title: A Better Internet
wordpressWpPostsEn.content:
This won’t be a technical article, neither about a new stack or development metodology. However, I would like to share my experience and opinion about internet as a web developer and user.

We may have endless good things about internet; it closer people, it allows access information easyly, simplify proccess that I done before with more efford (such as shopping, paying bills, checking our bank account). Internet is in a huge part of ours lives and tends to become even more present in the future.

On the other hand, companies and politicians also use it to their own benefics and not so much to good of people. I know that there is not a book with Internet’s commandments and how it must be used but as a person that always tries to do something good, I truly believe we should enjoy our capatibility of reaching so many people and influence their lives positivily with our jobs. Not just do code for code.

As developers, we always contribute with open source community, we try to solve problems or improve products that we’re working on. What if we take these habilitties beyond our job to build a better internet?

Let me give my example, In 2014 I was diagnosticated with Crohn’s disease, a autoimune inflammatory illness cureless, at that time I barely found information about it and after had learnt how to live with the disease, I decided to create a simple blog with WordPress to share everything that I’d learnt. Through that blog I helped plenty of patience, I made friends and I was invited to participate in events.

I also made work volunteer with homeless in SÃ£o Paulo city with a NGO and I built their website for free to their have more visibility and more investing.

These opportunities are great to start learning a new stack, a different project’s architecture, beside increase your portfolio as a developer and help other people.

You can pick any cause that you are interested, like:

  • Blinded people.
  • Olders.
  • Refugees.
  • Homeless.
  • Children.
  • Climate change.
  • Share information.

Any idea or efford is important. We have capatibility to create a better internet and I’m not talking about perfommance.
